articles.description: Mark Fay followed his mother's advice and was determined to enjoy himself. The result? This amusing video taped while in lockdown in the hotel.
articles.content:
Mark Fay had been living in London and working as a tour guide through Europe when the coronavirus pandemic hit.

articles.title: First stop Gold Coast, then who knows? AFL’s hub plan explained - Fox Sports
articles.description: The AFL has confirmed the competition will remain flexible throughout the season, allowing for clubs based away from their home state to potentially return if COVID-19 restrictions are eased.

articles.description: AFL CEO Gillon McLachlan has confirmed footy will resume on June 11, with a vast number of new initiatives and protocols in place to ensure the sport's return.
